mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO tb_deliveries ( dlvryNo, stoBrcofcId, stoId, dlvryCusTelno, dlvryCusAdres, dlvryCusRoadAdres,
dlvryCusDetlAdres,
dlvryCusLa, dlvryCusLo, dlvryPaySeCd, dlvryFoodAmnt, dlvryAmnt, dlvryPickReqTm, dlvryRecvDt, dlvryDstnc,
dlvryReqCn,
dlvryStateCd
) VALUES ( #{dlvryNo}, #{stoBrcofcId}, #{stoId}, #{dlvryCusTelno}, #{dlvryCusAdres}, #{dlvryCusRoadAdres},
#{dlvryCusDetlAdres},
#{dlvryCusLa}, #{dlvryCusLo}, #{dlvryPaySeCd}, #{dlvryFoodAmnt}, #{dlvryAmnt}, #{dlvryPickReqTm}, #{dlvryRecvDt}, #{dlvryDstnc},
#{dlvryReqCn}
#{dlvryStateCd} )
